thread.title: Liberation services cancelled tomorrow
thread.title_full: Liberation services cancelled tomorrow | Channel - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Liberation services cancelled tomorrow
text:
The Condor Liberation will not sail tomorrow so that engineers can inspect the ship after mechanical issues with it last week.
The faults have caused numerous cancellations and disruptions to Condor services since Friday.
Services were delayed on Friday, Liberation services were cancelled on Saturday and yesterday nearly 140 cars were left stranded in Poole after the boat was overbooked.
Those affected by tomorrow's cancellation will travel on Wednesday and Thursday.
A Poole-Guernsey-Poole service did sail at 03:00 this morning and an extra Poole-Jersey-Poole service will sail at 14:30.
A normal service is expected to operate from Wednesday.
Last updated Mon 21 Sep 2015 Read more 21 updates Condor Liberation services cancelled after mechanical issues Travel Guernsey Jersey
